meanings.definition: The quality of being helpful; providing assistance or support.
meanings.sent1: Her helpfulness in guiding me through the project was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent2: I always rely on his helpfulness whenever I need advice.
meanings.sent3: The robot's helpfulness in the kitchen made it the star of the cooking show.
meanings.sent4: His helpfulness was like a shining beacon in the sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The helpfulness of the map made navigating the city a breeze.

meanings.definition: The act of giving aid or assistance.
meanings.sent1: The helpfulness of the volunteers during the disaster relief efforts was commendable.
meanings.sent2: She showed her helpfulness by assisting the elderly lady with her groceries.
meanings.sent3: The helpfulness of the clown in the circus act added an unexpected twist.
meanings.sent4: His helpfulness was a lifeline in the stormy sea of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The helpfulness of the flashlight saved them from stumbling in the dark.
